full_translation:
*The Supreme Jade Writ of the Luminous Silk Text for Determining Immortal Registers*

**Title:** *The Supreme Jade Writ of the Luminous Silk Text for Determining Immortal Registers*
**Author:** Unknown, likely composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties, attributed to the Perfected Queen Mother of the Western Citadel (Wang Fu-ren of the Shangqing tradition).
**Compilation:** Incorporates esoteric graphs and true names from the registers of the Three Caverns.
**Volume:** One scroll.
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Yujue* (Jade Instructions) category of the *Dongzhen* (Cavern of Perfection) section.

---

*The Supreme Jade Writ of the Luminous Silk Text for Determining Immortal Registers*
**Transmitted by the Queen Mother of the Golden Citadel of the Western Realm**

On the first day of a certain month and year, marked by the cyclical signs *jiazi*, the adept [Name], styled [Honorific], having been blessed in a former life and now favored in this one, previously received from the Dharma Master [Name] of [Sacred Peak] the inner instructions of the *Luminous Silk Text*, the scriptures of the host of sages, and the Way of ascending as an immortal—thereby determining one’s immortal rank. The chapters were sealed with golden tokens, and the oath was sworn in blood before the White Phoenix, binding for an eon until a worthy successor might receive the transmission.

Now, a fellow aspirant, having begun the study of the *jia-yi* (first stages of Daoist practice) and already received the great covenant of the supreme sacred statutes, governs the myriad spirits, summons demonic and numinous beings, commands dragons and summons perfected ones, seals and oversees the Five Peaks, and supervises the rivers and springs. Having engraved the original text of the oath, it ascends to the mysterious void; having cut blood for the pact, the talismanic ranks of the myriad perfected are established. The seven ancestral generations stand witness to the covenant—this teaching is not lightly transmitted.

Should the secret graphs and texts of the *Luminous Silk* be divulged, the transgressor’s corpse shall be severed in the dark springs, their seven generations of parents shall suffer interrogation by the Three Officials, and they shall be judged according to the statutes of the Four Poles.

**The secret name of the Heavenly Sovereign Lord is *He*.**
**[Four graphs.]**

The Earthly Sovereign Lord’s secret name is *Zha*. **[Seven graphs.]**

The Human Sovereign Lord’s secret name is *Chang*. **[Five graphs.]**

With the eye aligned to the bright star within the Celestial Heart, the minor luminaries and lesser astral bodies, the Qian and Kun earthly deities, the Dipper’s reception, the forest’s tremor, the mao earthly gate, the xun cyclical branch, the wu noon, the human portal at yong, the dui western gate, the qian celestial gate, the si ghost gate, the gen cyclical branch, the head’s wu, the jia, yi, bing, ding, geng, xin, ren—none may ride the rigid stalwart or approach the human realm. Yang’s lament, benevolence’s longevity, prosperity’s nine heavens, nine heavens’ nine lands, nine humans’ destinies, nine perfected ones, nine Ways, nine transmissions, nine births, nine subtleties, nine mysteries, nine essentials, nine completions—with these, transcend the heavens. Zhang the Valiant, thirty prohibitions, the dragon’s mandate, the nine constructions of morning and night, the nine establishments of removal and fullness, the stabilization of the celestial chambers, the ascent of luminous deities—these are the vital flexions of fate’s phrases. Assist the radiant fire’s three humans, the nine heavens’ scorching flame, the nine celestial reckonings of the spirit’s great emergence. The azure soul’s distant decree commands the earth to bow thrice. Nine stones, nine jade maidens emerge from the young luminaries’ triad. The three qian prohibitions, nine pellets, nine celestial transformations, nine oxen, two humans, the fish of the sun—none may equal thirty days. The nine unities of left and right, the four stone mountains’ deities issue forth destiny’s prosperity. Between the maidens’ intervals, the Ding of Prosperity emerges, entering and exiting within the Five Emperors. The Five Emperors confer upon the Three Sovereigns’ primal heads—once enlightened, the August Right’s excellence enters the Grand Clarity’s fiery Horn, Neck, House, Heart, Tail, Winnowing Basket, Dipper, Ox, Maiden, Emptiness, Rooftop, Chamber, Straddler, Harvester, Stomach, Punishment, Net, Turtle Beak, Triad—destiny seeks immortality. The five unite with the eternal heights, the nine heavens’ Great One, the Northern Army, the Five Peaks, the Four Readings, the Three Rivers, the Six Lords, the Eastern Sea’s thirty-six thousand dark luminaries, the stars and constellations, the ancient ghosts and spirits, the hidden origins, the myriad convergences—those who revere shall preserve; those who lose shall perish. Should one emerge as a true person, they shall not be led astray. Prosperity attends the heavens, awaiting the imperial command. Should the path curve, the nine dukes and marquises’ true persons shall serve the river, augment the Dipper, govern the five hearts, and follow the celestial mandate from youth to age—the immortal artisans.

**[The Heavenly Sovereign’s section comprises 314 graphs.]**

The eight directions’ cyclic completion does not decree life’s seclusion. The shen sea’s fiery king, the dragon’s jade wall, the great stone’s celestial shen enters the azure sea’s firm canopy. The six ding’s rivers must follow the stars’ flow, investigating antiquity. The Han’s ancestral lineage, the Yin’s five generations’ radiant illumination, the divine Tang’s essence—what celestial chart does the summoned pavilion of the mountain’s separation derive from? The Ming Emperor, having established Ye, harmonized with the divine. The young northern star, Li’s nine gen, the drum’s thunder lord—only when internally bound to the Dipper does it not divide the sun’s governance. Paired with the Ox, they form herds, coming like swallows, departing like rats and insects. The myriad dark destinies lie in wait, with the streaming stars and the twenty cyclical branches. Cherishing the root, the nine heavens’ mountains, stones, and waters—clarity severs sorrow. The assistant studies jade essence, the martial world’s urgent merit, privately embracing the one. The ten above and below, the three eights’ domains, the qian and gen’s nine, the two and four’s xun issue forth destiny. The Yi’s absence from the rivers, seas, and great pools’ depths—within the sorrowful, the divine’s qi communicates. With qian entering kun, the two extremes’ convergence—doubt ceases, the right assists the branches’ beginning. The universal urgency of ghosts, the urgency of sins, the premature doom of blessings—transcend the mountains’ woods, the mounds’ peril. The August Dragon pairs with yin’s extremes. The seven divisions of sun and moon, the Dipper’s entry into the celestial father—nine mysteries encircle the heavens, aiding the celestial maidens’ jade luster. The vermilion eyes’ fiery decree must extinguish the heavens’ center, the waters’ center, the sheep, each celestial arrow. The human and the sun and moon’s great brilliance.

**[The Earthly Sovereign’s section comprises 233 graphs.]**

In the worldly dragon’s celestial tusk, the great heavens’ Zhang Mingye, the four nines’ mountains flow weakly, emerging from the left eight hundred’s midst. The Zi Celestial Gate collects ghosts, uniting with the nine heavens’ entry into the nine mountains’ urgency. Revering the Horn’s non-Peng, the jia and yi’s celestial grandson, the three heavens’ luminous white—ghosts are thus commanded by the August Heaven’s decree. The six ding comply as the statutes command. The hundred ghosts, not the stars, depart urgently. The three heavens’ mandate—above, it becomes the forest’s ghosts. The young’s sincerity decides the sun’s division into places of emergence and departure. Joy accompanies the azure tiger. The Three Sovereigns’ northern edict—also named the Twenty-Eight Constellations—advances the mandate. The Great One emerges from the vast heavens’ nine tracks, suddenly possessing the statutes’ enclosure. Movement and pacing comply with the almanac’s records. The three urgent commands of the luminous lord differ—thus, the nine rivers’ avoidance texts appear. The Thunder Duke differs—thus, the nine rivers blaze, governing the myriad emergences. The Dipper and Ox extend life without end. The celestial minister’s mutual assistance does not terminate the statutory text.

**[The Human Sovereign’s section comprises 158 graphs.]**

The nine heavens command the Upper Heaven’s lesser Northern Army, the Eastern Sea’s Azure Lad, the Dark General, the Divine King Father, the responsive jade stars’ positions, the jade maidens, the mysterious deities, the Great Emperor, the Thunder Duke’s arrayed positions, the yang ding, the Three Sovereigns, the Five Lords, the Six Dukes. The exalted names reach the celestial chambers, entering all rivers and peaks.

**[The Great Talisman comprises 50 graphs.]**

The High Nine Heavens command the August Emperor of the Upper Heaven, the lesser Northern Army, the Eastern Sea’s Lesser Lad, the Dark General’s horse, the Divine King Father, the responsive Queen Mother bearing positions, the jade maidens, the mysterious deities, the Clear Heaven’s Supreme Emperor, the Cloud Thunder Duke’s arrayed positions, the yin and yang’s six ding, the Three Sovereigns, the Five Lords. The urgent memorial commands compliance. The exalted summons the High Heaven’s Western Chamber Lady, entering all rivers and peaks’ forty-eight seated positions. The celestial and earthly various maidens’ talismans arrive as summoned. The Jade Maiden, Plain Maiden, Charming Maiden, Purple Radiance, Mysterious Essence, River Wondrous One, the Five Peaks’ Azure Forest, the Nine Heavens’ parents, the Wind Earl—send names urgently as commanded. The Celestial Chancellor, the Swift Censor, the Fire Lord, the Divine Lady—once the memorial arrives, hasten as the statutes command. The three urgent commands of the luminous lord—Bao Hu’s sudden departure, the Three Ladies, the Old Woman, Peng’s son—inquire urgently to assume positions without delay. The Celestial Day’s Patrol stabs the treacherous and investigates affairs in the Nine Heavens.

**[The Internal Text comprises 162 graphs.]**

The Three Sovereigns together comprise 933 graphs.

The Eastern Peak Lord’s tabooed name is Qu Gengsheng.
The Southern Peak Lord’s tabooed name is Zhu Changzhong.
The Central Peak Lord’s tabooed name is Jade Essence.
The Western Peak Lord’s tabooed name is Ru Quzheng.
The Northern Peak Lord’s tabooed name is Xuan Yinfeng.

The Five Azure Pearls, the Nine Heavens’ parents—send names urgently as commanded. The Celestial Chancellor, the Swift Censor, the Most High Divine One—once the memorial arrives, hasten as the statutes command. The three luminous lords—Bao Hu’s sudden departure, the Three Heavenly Persons, the Old Master—inquire urgently to assume positions without delay. The Celestial Day’s Patrol investigates treacherous affairs and reports all who fail to answer the summons.

The Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, and Metal Emperors of the Nine Heavens—whose tabooed names reside in the worldly dragon—are commanded by the Nine Heavens to ascend to the heavens. The Lesser Northern Army, the Eastern Sea Youth, the Dark General, the Divine King Father, the Responding King, the Chancellor—take positions. The Jade Maiden, the Mysterious Spirit, the Great Emperor, the Numinous Thunder Duke—send names to their ranks. The yang-ding, the Three Sovereigns, the Five Lords—once the memorial arrives at the Highest, summon the High Heaven’s Western Chamber Lady to enter all the river and mountain forty-eight seats. The celestial and earthly various maidens’ talismans arrive as summoned. The Jade Maiden, Charming Maiden, Purple Radiance, Mysterious Essence, River Wondrous One, the Five Azure Pearls, the Nine Heavens’ parents—send names urgently as commanded. The Celestial Chancellor, the Most High Divine One—once the memorial arrives, hasten as the statutes command.

**[The Five Peaks comprise 164 graphs. The Five Peaks together total one hundred graphs.]**

The Seventy-Eight Graphs.
The Numinous Treasure Lord’s surname and taboo name.

**Eastern Direction (120 graphs):**
The Nine Qi’s Primordial Sovereign of the Azure Heaven, the Green Radiance, and the Towering Guardians—within them dwells an Elder who oversees the celestial registers and commands qi to summon immortals. The Year Star assists the liver; Horn, Neck, and the Four Quarters’ revolving scenes are governed by Winnowing Basket, master of the Seven Luminaries. The Dipper’s bright wheel receives qi, seizing the false and sweeping away calamities. The Eastern Mountain’s divine incantation summons the Nine Heavens’ Red Script talismans to bind Fengdu, restrain demons, and dispatch ghosts—none dare evade execution. All are sent to the Wood Palace. Should any delay, the Eastern River and the Vast Sea’s water spirits shall be constrained: great kalpas of floods, dragons bearing disasters, and the Water Palace’s paths—hundreds and thousands of passages—shall be opened by the Supreme Emperor’s Red Writ amid the primordial wind and fire.

**Eastern Direction Talisman (16 graphs):**
The Nine Qi’s Azure Heaven illuminates the true Dao; the Jade Talisman commands qi, treasured by all perfected beings.

**Southern Direction (148 graphs):**
Within the Vermilion Heaven’s Crimson Emperor and Jade Hall resides a great spirit named the Crimson Sovereign, whose blazing flames and threefold qi radiate brilliance. Immortals receive their mandate in accord with destiny; the Great Fire Star assists the heart. Well and Ghost guard Chamber; Willow, Star, Spread, and Wing resist the Four Quarters. The Seven Lodgings revolve, the celestial constant summoned to hasten convergence upon the true Dao. The Red Writ commands spirits; the north binds Fengdu, dispatching demonic lineages and severing evil roots. The talisman’s decree punishes clearly, enumerating crimes. The Southern Mountain’s divine incantation subdues the Eight Directions’ myriad demons, annihilating all trials. The Southern River’s Water Emperor, Great Earl, and Dragon Kings’ incantations circulate, universally sweeping away inauspicious floods and flying disasters. Dragons are summoned to open and clear waterways—thousands of paths, myriad passages. Should any dare transgress, they shall be sent to the Fire Palace by the Red Writ’s proclamation; none may disobey.

**Southern Direction Talisman (8 graphs):**
The Primordial Supreme Emperor opens Heaven and Earth.

**Central Direction (144 graphs):**
The Yellow High Heaven’s Central Numinous One, the Primordial, gives birth to the Five Elders. The August Highest commands qi, supervises the perfected, and oversees the immortals’ records and mysterious charts. Jade Writs hasten the ascent of qi, universally notifying the myriad spirits. The Quelling Star assists the spleen; the Northern Culmen revolves, mastering the false and severing evil roots. Dust is swept away, miasmas dispelled. The Mysterious Dipper’s bright degrees traverse the Celestial Pass. The Nine Heavens’ talismanic commands are transmitted by the Golden Horse Post, constraining the Northern Emperor to block the Ghost Gate and excise inauspiciousness. None may stand before it. The Central Mountain’s divine incantation summons dragons to ascend clouds, converging upon the Yellow River’s nine streams. The river’s source may not overflow; good and evil are distinguished. A thousand demons and myriad deceits face the Emperor Lord. Should any dare transgress, the Great Yang’s scorching flames shall burn the Red Writ’s jade graphs, proclaiming universally.

**Central Direction Talisman (9 graphs):**
Master all immortals, command and summon the river’s source.

**Western Direction (136 graphs):**
The White Emperor of the Pale Heaven’s Seven Gates, the Golden Numinous One, shines resplendently. The Great Hua’s flowing vapors and the towering White Stone’s sevenfold qi billow upward. There dwells the Primordial Elder, a great spirit who oversees lung qi, governs the Nine Heavens’ registers, and commands the ascent of immortals. The Great White Star inspects the lungs; Straddler and Harvester guard the soul; Stomach, Mane, and Net assist. The Seven Passes are mastered by the Three Stars; the Dipper’s handle receives talismans. The Northern Culmen’s Red Writ and jade graphs, the Nine Heavens’ true script, summon the myriad qi to return universally to the Emperor Lord. The Western Mountain’s divine incantation, the Eight Might’s Seven Transmissions, summons dragons from waters and clouds from mountains, all converging at the Emperor’s gate to assist and guard the perfected. Evil roots are severed. Should any inauspiciousness arise, it shall be cut off by the Golden Pass. The Red Writ’s talismanic commands are transmitted by wind and fire.

**Western Direction Talisman (7 graphs):**
Advance the true, command the correct, and all spirits obey.

**Northern Direction (120 graphs):**
The Dark Heaven’s Five Qi meander; within dwell the Black Emperor and the Twin Sovereigns of the Great Subtlety, who oversee talismanic commands. Immortals refine the Eight Might, clad in azure skirts and feathered capes, dragon-patterned and phoenix-robed. The Supreme Emperor’s decrees ascend the Jade Stairs. The Northern Culmen assists the kidneys; Dipper and Oxguard defend the gates; Girl, Void, Rooftop, and Encampment open the Four Quarters. The Seven Stars grasp the baleful, rectify the false, and sweep away calamities, illuminating the Dao with penetrating radiance. The Northern Mountain’s divine incantation stirs yang to summon thunder, flowing bells, and blazing meteors. The Heavenly Ape shakes the heavens with might. The Northern Fengdu’s legions—myriad demons—are annihilated. The Nine Rivers drain dry; the Crow Mother’s flock scatters. Dragons open waterways; paths are cleared. The Red Writ’s jade graphs are transmitted by galloping dragons and racing winds.

**Northern Direction Talisman (8 graphs):**
The Mysterious Highest and Jade Clarity command the Northern Fengdu’s dragons.

**The Five Directions’ Closing Writs:**
The sun and moon fix the mountains and waters; the Three Heavens’ great measures cause the myriad perfected to meander. *(Azure Emperor, 16 graphs)*
Jade tones exhale qi; the Three Primes govern, preserving life and determining immortality. The Jade Calendar seals and fixes. *(Crimson Emperor, 16 graphs)*
Summon Heaven and Earth’s Nine Origins to judge and unite the Five Qi; the Supreme Emperor gazes afar. *(Yellow Emperor, 16 graphs)*
The Five Elders’ chariots survey the Nine Capitals; kalpas beyond count converge, illuminating and fixing the Nine Rivers. *(White Emperor, 16 graphs)*
The Heavenly Net and Northern Dipper fix the Nine Appointments; radiance scatters to the Eight Extremes, the Mysterious Compassion Stone. *(Black Emperor, 16 graphs)*

**True Writ’s Frontispiece (28 graphs):**
The Heavenly Numinous Foot-Soldiers ascend to Heaven; on Earth, the sun’s birth opens the day. The Mandate of Heaven commands might; the Master of Corpses and the Earth’s Mandate emerge. The sun, moon, Heaven, and Earth measure.

Infant and Life-Controller, Record-Keeper, Southern and Northern Lords, Northern Dipper’s Seven Stars inspect and seize. Twenty-Eight Lodgings entwine this body’s form. Supreme Mystery’s Yin-Yang, three-foot Dharma, pure contemplation, bing-turning guard, traversing the Nine Heavens’ degrees. Yang’s Nine Circulations gather the hundred streams. Crimson Clarity’s Great Possession blazes, descending with fire bells. Golden Perfection’s Queen Mother is titled Imperial Court’s Divine Soldiers—one hundred thousand strong—driving away inauspiciousness. Holding cloth and records, they guard the Life Gate. Heavenly Creases lead the van; tiger warriors repel the advance. Great Possession’s Upper Dao initiates and reports the Perfected Text.**

Here follows the translation:

---

Right: Summoning the Host of Immortals Talisman, one hundred thirty-five characters.

Right: Three Realms’ Void-Traversing Talisman, eight characters.
August Heaven’s Supreme Lord commands the summoning of the Ten Directions to expel defiled qi. Great Possession’s Divine Immortals, Nine-Five’s Upper Dao, roam the Golden Perfection’s register, fixing records and rectifying the Three Heavens’ clarity.

Right: Numinous Flight Talisman, thirty-two characters.
Supreme Three Heavens’ Great Void, Northern Culmen, Most High’s Five Dippers firmly establish the Four Stars. Crimson Script seizes the false and enumerates the Nine Heavens’ left-supporting Three Heavens’ life-command text.

Right: Returning Numinous Descending Perfected Talisman, thirty characters.
Most High’s Three Heavens, Five Venerable Lords, Sun and Moon, Five Planets—imperfect script’s imperial talisman commands, inscribing names in the Jade Chapters.

Right: Eastern and Western Twin Flowers Talisman, twenty-four characters.
Celestial Stars, Mountain Ji, Two Dippers—Zi bears the charge of slaying; northward, the Lord of Life; southward, Southern Dipper’s balanced dual qi. August Heaven’s Great Possession, Life-Controller, fixes the register.

Right: Two Dippers’ Life-Controlling Talisman, twenty-eight characters.
Nine Stars, Three Terraces, Azure Lad shines forth, ascending the degrees of the Great Perfected. Five Venerable Lords luminously summon, their radiant talismans seizing and capturing the myriad demons—reverently wondrous.

Right: Azure Lad Talisman, twenty-four characters.
Above Heaven, below Heaven—formless, nameless, Mysterious Supreme Perfected. Ten Directions’ hidden names’ script.

Right: Hidden Script Talisman, sixteen characters.
Supreme Mysterious Origin, Five Thearchs’ spontaneous Jade Void talisman command, Nine Heavens.

Right: Five Thearchs’ Direct Talisman, fourteen characters.
Nine Heavens’ Jade Void transforms and engenders Eastern Wood’s nine qi, spontaneously regulating the Upper Radiant Star’s Wood Palace, Mysterious Origin’s upright qi.

Right: Jia-Yi Penetrating Numinous Talisman, twenty-two characters.
Three qi issue life, Heaven transforms and engenders the Three Origins’ light. Azure Fire’s solar origin essence, Three-Five’s Nine-One, Mysterious Supreme qi-controller.

Right: Bing-Ding Penetrating Numinous Talisman, twenty-three characters.
Seven qi, plain mystery, Metal qi, Kun-Dui’s barrier. White King’s luminous life-command, Earth’s Kun Mountain engenders Heaven.

Right: Geng-Xin Penetrating Numinous Jade Talisman, eighteen characters.
Five qi, Black Thearch transforms and engenders the Mysterious Void’s secondary Water. Flying traversal, Water engenders luminous qi.

Right: Ren-Gui Penetrating Numinous Talisman, sixteen characters.
August Earth, Metal life-command—Wu-Ji’s five soils, upright Six Mysteries. Ji’s five complete the primordial qi.

Right: Wu-Ji Penetrating Numinous Talisman, sixteen characters.
Heaven possesses Six Jia, commanding Jade Palace’s three engenderings, spontaneous Five Thearchs’ qi.

Right: Jia-Zi Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman, fourteen characters.
Vast Heaven, Fire Mountain’s luminous light—worldly mystery conjoins the Most High’s commanding qi.

Right: Jia-Wu Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman, thirteen characters.
Wu-Ji transforms and engenders Mysterious Origin’s three qi, issuing the Radiant King’s Three-Five rectitude.

Right: Jia-Xu Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman, fourteen characters.
Mysterious engendering, Ninefold Supreme’s Primal August Lord—Three-Five’s Six Harmonies initiate Azure Heaven.

Right: Jia-Yin Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman, fourteen characters.
Six Jia’s luminous Heaven, Three-Five’s primordial life-command—great transformation, spontaneous Heaven’s clarity.

Right: Jia-Shen Plain Memorial Cinnabar Talisman, fourteen characters.
Wood life-command, Mysterious Origin—Water’s western reflection completes the field. Bing-Chou Lord employs four names: Dawn Moon Talisman King. As for the human chariot, Eastern Lord Wang possesses fields, demonstrating connections—none are easily traversed. Eastern Radiance’s bow-star governs rivers. Zhai Zhongwang’s left, Bing’s day, Upper Radiant Heaven Mountain’s east. Yi’s six li garments emerge from Azure Mound. Minister Wei’s strength, Yi’s Wu stones, Mysterious Mountain’s Great King. Gate connects fields, luminous humans—two armies, Western Borough’s textual governance. Four engenderings: Dragon, human, river, peace. Male heart, King Sun’s corpse-king, human luminosity, excellence, bow’s four divisions. Scholar’s west, Zi’s great ease derives from Heaven’s mandate. Northern connections, enduring luminosity—corpse-king emerges, two connections, lunar husband. Reverent Lord, lunar waters, mountains emerge, Mountain Changming. Ji’s day, Great Chou’s four—same as above. Wang’s one luminous mound halts luminous obscurity. Lunar king, small fields, husband’s specialization—Fire’s Ji fields, Changsheng’s four divisions. Northern Fire Mountain’s Yu connections, images above halt. King Sun’s stellar non-connections, four connections conjoin. Wisdom’s great mystery, Heaven’s clarity, Heaven’s sun.

Right: Numinous Flight Six Jia Talisman, one hundred eighty characters.
Azure Thearch initiates clarity, Great Clarity’s brilliance. Crimson Thearch’s mysterious clarity, virtue/power opens. White Thearch’s luminous stone, Great Master’s vastness. Black Thearch’s mysterious compassion, Most High Perfected. Yellow Thearch, Five Venerable Lords, Upper Perfected—primordial fusion.

Right: Five Thearchs’ Talisman, thirty-five characters.
Bow-Dragon’s traversing spirit emerges, expelling inauspiciousness, repelling the false and ominous.

Right: These eleven characters are the Human-Bird Mountain Talisman’s oral instructions, privately entrusted and recorded hereafter.

The Most High’s *Seeking Immortality, Fixing the Register: Silk’s True Instructions and Jade Texts* concludes.

chunks.original_text: 太上求仙定录尺素真诀玉文 经名：太上求仙定录尺素真诀玉文。 撰人不详，约出於南北朝，假托上清仙真王夫人受。 纂集三洞诸经录中秘字真讳#１。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部玉诀类。 太上求仙定录尺素真诀玉文 西城金母王夫人受 某年月朔日甲子，某岳先生某君，先身有幸，庆逮今生，前从某岳先生法师某甲，受尺素内诀，众圣策文，升仙上道，以定仙品，都章信金，白凤血盟，一劫之后，有贤听传。 今有同志，始学甲乙，已受大盟上圣灵科，总领万神，召会魔灵，役龙命真，封掌五岳，司察川源，刻誓本文，上飞玄虚，割血为约，符位万真，七祖临盟，义不轻传。 有泄尺素密字诀文，尸绝幽泉，七玄父母，受考三官，依四极科上文。 天皇君讳阂。 四字。
chunks.translated_text:
*The Supreme Jade Writ of the Luminous Silk Text for Determining Immortal Registers*

**Title:** *The Supreme Jade Writ of the Luminous Silk Text for Determining Immortal Registers*
**Author:** Unknown, likely composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties, attributed to the Perfected Queen Mother of the Western Citadel (Wang Fu-ren of the Shangqing tradition).
**Compilation:** Incorporates esoteric graphs and true names from the registers of the Three Caverns.
**Volume:** One scroll.
**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Yujue* (Jade Instructions) category of the *Dongzhen* (Cavern of Perfection) section.

---

*The Supreme Jade Writ of the Luminous Silk Text for Determining Immortal Registers*
**Transmitted by the Queen Mother of the Golden Citadel of the Western Realm**

On the first day of a certain month and year, marked by the cyclical signs *jiazi*, the adept [Name], styled [Honorific], having been blessed in a former life and now favored in this one, previously received from the Dharma Master [Name] of [Sacred Peak] the inner instructions of the *Luminous Silk Text*, the scriptures of the host of sages, and the Way of ascending as an immortal—thereby determining one’s immortal rank. The chapters were sealed with golden tokens, and the oath was sworn in blood before the White Phoenix, binding for an eon until a worthy successor might receive the transmission.

Now, a fellow aspirant, having begun the study of the *jia-yi* (first stages of Daoist practice) and already received the great covenant of the supreme sacred statutes, governs the myriad spirits, summons demonic and numinous beings, commands dragons and summons perfected ones, seals and oversees the Five Peaks, and supervises the rivers and springs. Having engraved the original text of the oath, it ascends to the mysterious void; having cut blood for the pact, the talismanic ranks of the myriad perfected are established. The seven ancestral generations stand witness to the covenant—this teaching is not lightly transmitted.

Should the secret graphs and texts of the *Luminous Silk* be divulged, the transgressor’s corpse shall be severed in the dark springs, their seven generations of parents shall suffer interrogation by the Three Officials, and they shall be judged according to the statutes of the Four Poles.

**The secret name of the Heavenly Sovereign Lord is *He*.**
**[Four graphs.]**

chunks.original_text: 地皇君讳闸。 七字。 人皇君讳阊。 五字。 与目自天心中明星月少小功曜而乾坤地祇斗受林震卯地户巽戊午人门邕兑酉天门乾巳鬼门艮戊头甲乙丙丁庚辛壬无丙辛乘刚魁临人生杨哀仁寿昌九天九天九土九人命九真九道九述九生九妙九玄九要九成与超天张公良三十勿明命龙晨夜九建除满定房上明神之要屈命句扶明火三人炎九天算神大出魂苍有远令土拜三石九玉女出少明三乾勿九丸九天化九牛二人鱼日非三十日无九同左右四石山祇出命昌间少女昌鼎出入在五帝五帝授及三皇元首既明右皇惟良太清入火角亢氏房心尾箕斗牛女虚危室壁奎娄胃勖毕觜参命寿求神仙五与恒高九天太一北军五岳四读三河六君东海三万六千玄曜星辰古鬼神翳藏原流万沈同家归仰者存失之者亡人能出正人不将昌天侍御超余太天福大寿若曲又九公侯正人侍河加斗五心律天命少及长仙匠。 右天皇三百十四字。 八方周聿非命生闺申海火王龙璧大石天申入苍海固盖景六丁川必星流稽古汉祖宗徇吉钦明殷五代之世熙照神唐精何天图由招亭岳离由天作明皇老以建邺协神少北星李九艮惮鼓雷君但得内系斗不为分日治偕偶牛成群来燕去鼠虫万玄命伺与流星与戊并二十爱本良九天山石水切明吊丞学玉精武世急功私抱为一十上下三八所乾艮九二四巽出命 夷罔河海江洪池渊在愁人神通气与乾入坤二甚州合离止疑右扶支始普急鬼急罪夭祚超爰岳木陵堪危皇龙配阴甚七分日月斗入天甫大九玄周辅天女子玉瑛彤目火令必灭天中水中羊各天矢人且日月大。 右地皇二百三十三字。 在世龙天牙大天张明耶天四九山流弱出左八百中曰子天门收鬼同九天入九山急崇角非彭甲乙天孙三天昭白且相鬼以皇天所勅六丁就如律令百鬼非星去急吉三天有命上为林鬼然少诚决分日为处出发有喜与苍虎三皇北诏又名二十八宿进命太一皆出昊天九轨奄有律围动度履就书历书急三上明公别乃有九江辟文见雷公别乃九江赫治万而出斗牛延命不亡非天相终法文。 右人皇一百五十八字。 九天命上天小北军东海青童幽将神王父应玉辰位玉女玄神大帝雷公列位阳丁三皇五君有六公高上名至天房入皆河岳。 右大符五十字。 高九天命皇帝上天小北军东海小童马幽将神王父应命王母承位玉女玄神清天上帝云雷公列位阴阳六丁三皇五君有急疏勅就高上召高天西房夫人入皆河岳四十八坐处天地诸女符至如召亨须答命玉女素女娇英紫华玄秖河妙五岳碧林九天父母风伯送名急令如令天丞相骠御史火上神夫人疏到催促如律令三上明公鲍忽御三夫人女老彭子亨问急就位不得稽留天一日游刺奸校事九天。 右内文一百六十二字。 三皇合九百三十三字。
chunks.translated_text:
The Earthly Sovereign Lord’s secret name is *Zha*. **[Seven graphs.]**

The Human Sovereign Lord’s secret name is *Chang*. **[Five graphs.]**

With the eye aligned to the bright star within the Celestial Heart, the minor luminaries and lesser astral bodies, the Qian and Kun earthly deities, the Dipper’s reception, the forest’s tremor, the mao earthly gate, the xun cyclical branch, the wu noon, the human portal at yong, the dui western gate, the qian celestial gate, the si ghost gate, the gen cyclical branch, the head’s wu, the jia, yi, bing, ding, geng, xin, ren—none may ride the rigid stalwart or approach the human realm. Yang’s lament, benevolence’s longevity, prosperity’s nine heavens, nine heavens’ nine lands, nine humans’ destinies, nine perfected ones, nine Ways, nine transmissions, nine births, nine subtleties, nine mysteries, nine essentials, nine completions—with these, transcend the heavens. Zhang the Valiant, thirty prohibitions, the dragon’s mandate, the nine constructions of morning and night, the nine establishments of removal and fullness, the stabilization of the celestial chambers, the ascent of luminous deities—these are the vital flexions of fate’s phrases. Assist the radiant fire’s three humans, the nine heavens’ scorching flame, the nine celestial reckonings of the spirit’s great emergence. The azure soul’s distant decree commands the earth to bow thrice. Nine stones, nine jade maidens emerge from the young luminaries’ triad. The three qian prohibitions, nine pellets, nine celestial transformations, nine oxen, two humans, the fish of the sun—none may equal thirty days. The nine unities of left and right, the four stone mountains’ deities issue forth destiny’s prosperity. Between the maidens’ intervals, the Ding of Prosperity emerges, entering and exiting within the Five Emperors. The Five Emperors confer upon the Three Sovereigns’ primal heads—once enlightened, the August Right’s excellence enters the Grand Clarity’s fiery Horn, Neck, House, Heart, Tail, Winnowing Basket, Dipper, Ox, Maiden, Emptiness, Rooftop, Chamber, Straddler, Harvester, Stomach, Punishment, Net, Turtle Beak, Triad—destiny seeks immortality. The five unite with the eternal heights, the nine heavens’ Great One, the Northern Army, the Five Peaks, the Four Readings, the Three Rivers, the Six Lords, the Eastern Sea’s thirty-six thousand dark luminaries, the stars and constellations, the ancient ghosts and spirits, the hidden origins, the myriad convergences—those who revere shall preserve; those who lose shall perish. Should one emerge as a true person, they shall not be led astray. Prosperity attends the heavens, awaiting the imperial command. Should the path curve, the nine dukes and marquises’ true persons shall serve the river, augment the Dipper, govern the five hearts, and follow the celestial mandate from youth to age—the immortal artisans.

**[The Heavenly Sovereign’s section comprises 314 graphs.]**

The eight directions’ cyclic completion does not decree life’s seclusion. The shen sea’s fiery king, the dragon’s jade wall, the great stone’s celestial shen enters the azure sea’s firm canopy. The six ding’s rivers must follow the stars’ flow, investigating antiquity. The Han’s ancestral lineage, the Yin’s five generations’ radiant illumination, the divine Tang’s essence—what celestial chart does the summoned pavilion of the mountain’s separation derive from? The Ming Emperor, having established Ye, harmonized with the divine. The young northern star, Li’s nine gen, the drum’s thunder lord—only when internally bound to the Dipper does it not divide the sun’s governance. Paired with the Ox, they form herds, coming like swallows, departing like rats and insects. The myriad dark destinies lie in wait, with the streaming stars and the twenty cyclical branches. Cherishing the root, the nine heavens’ mountains, stones, and waters—clarity severs sorrow. The assistant studies jade essence, the martial world’s urgent merit, privately embracing the one. The ten above and below, the three eights’ domains, the qian and gen’s nine, the two and four’s xun issue forth destiny. The Yi’s absence from the rivers, seas, and great pools’ depths—within the sorrowful, the divine’s qi communicates. With qian entering kun, the two extremes’ convergence—doubt ceases, the right assists the branches’ beginning. The universal urgency of ghosts, the urgency of sins, the premature doom of blessings—transcend the mountains’ woods, the mounds’ peril. The August Dragon pairs with yin’s extremes. The seven divisions of sun and moon, the Dipper’s entry into the celestial father—nine mysteries encircle the heavens, aiding the celestial maidens’ jade luster. The vermilion eyes’ fiery decree must extinguish the heavens’ center, the waters’ center, the sheep, each celestial arrow. The human and the sun and moon’s great brilliance.

**[The Earthly Sovereign’s section comprises 233 graphs.]**

In the worldly dragon’s celestial tusk, the great heavens’ Zhang Mingye, the four nines’ mountains flow weakly, emerging from the left eight hundred’s midst. The Zi Celestial Gate collects ghosts, uniting with the nine heavens’ entry into the nine mountains’ urgency. Revering the Horn’s non-Peng, the jia and yi’s celestial grandson, the three heavens’ luminous white—ghosts are thus commanded by the August Heaven’s decree. The six ding comply as the statutes command. The hundred ghosts, not the stars, depart urgently. The three heavens’ mandate—above, it becomes the forest’s ghosts. The young’s sincerity decides the sun’s division into places of emergence and departure. Joy accompanies the azure tiger. The Three Sovereigns’ northern edict—also named the Twenty-Eight Constellations—advances the mandate. The Great One emerges from the vast heavens’ nine tracks, suddenly possessing the statutes’ enclosure. Movement and pacing comply with the almanac’s records. The three urgent commands of the luminous lord differ—thus, the nine rivers’ avoidance texts appear. The Thunder Duke differs—thus, the nine rivers blaze, governing the myriad emergences. The Dipper and Ox extend life without end. The celestial minister’s mutual assistance does not terminate the statutory text.

**[The Human Sovereign’s section comprises 158 graphs.]**

The nine heavens command the Upper Heaven’s lesser Northern Army, the Eastern Sea’s Azure Lad, the Dark General, the Divine King Father, the responsive jade stars’ positions, the jade maidens, the mysterious deities, the Great Emperor, the Thunder Duke’s arrayed positions, the yang ding, the Three Sovereigns, the Five Lords, the Six Dukes. The exalted names reach the celestial chambers, entering all rivers and peaks.

**[The Great Talisman comprises 50 graphs.]**

The High Nine Heavens command the August Emperor of the Upper Heaven, the lesser Northern Army, the Eastern Sea’s Lesser Lad, the Dark General’s horse, the Divine King Father, the responsive Queen Mother bearing positions, the jade maidens, the mysterious deities, the Clear Heaven’s Supreme Emperor, the Cloud Thunder Duke’s arrayed positions, the yin and yang’s six ding, the Three Sovereigns, the Five Lords. The urgent memorial commands compliance. The exalted summons the High Heaven’s Western Chamber Lady, entering all rivers and peaks’ forty-eight seated positions. The celestial and earthly various maidens’ talismans arrive as summoned. The Jade Maiden, Plain Maiden, Charming Maiden, Purple Radiance, Mysterious Essence, River Wondrous One, the Five Peaks’ Azure Forest, the Nine Heavens’ parents, the Wind Earl—send names urgently as commanded. The Celestial Chancellor, the Swift Censor, the Fire Lord, the Divine Lady—once the memorial arrives, hasten as the statutes command. The three urgent commands of the luminous lord—Bao Hu’s sudden departure, the Three Ladies, the Old Woman, Peng’s son—inquire urgently to assume positions without delay. The Celestial Day’s Patrol stabs the treacherous and investigates affairs in the Nine Heavens.

**[The Internal Text comprises 162 graphs.]**

The Three Sovereigns together comprise 933 graphs.

chunks.original_text: 七十八字。 灵宝君姓讳。 东方九炁始皇青天碧霞郁垒中有老人总校图录摄气举仙岁星辅肝角亢镇真氏房心尾四景回旋箕主七辰正斗明轮承气捕非扫除灾群东山神咒摄召九天赤书符命制会酆山束魔送鬼所诛无蠲悉诣木宫敢有稽延下制东河溟海水神大劫洪灾蛟龙负身水府开道通径百千上帝赤文风火元间。 右东方一百二十字。 九气青天以明正道玉符摄气众真所宝。 右东方符十六字。 南方丹天赤帝玉堂中有大神号曰赤皇上炎流姻三气勃光神仙受命应运太阳荧惑辅心井鬼守房柳星张翼抗御四乡翰总七宿回转天常召运促会正道驿行赤文命灵北摄酆山束送魔宗斩灭邪根符教所讨明列罪原南山神咒威伏八方群妖灭爽万试摧亡南河水帝大伯龙王神咒流行普扫不祥洪水飞灾止召蛟龙开除水径千道万通敢有干试摄送火宫赤书所告莫有不从。 右南方一百四十八字。 元始上帝以开天地。 右南方符八字。 中央总灵黄上天元始生五老中皇高尊摄气监真总领旱仙典录玄图宿简玉文催运上气普告万神镇星辅脾徊度北元□□主非截邪斩根□□□□扫秽除氛□正玄斗明度天关九天符命金马驿传勅摄北帝遏塞鬼门剪除不祥莫有当前中山神咒召龙上云制会黄河九水河源不得殆纵善恶悉分千妖万奸上对帝君敢有干试太阳激焚赤书玉字宣告普闻。 右中央一百四十四字。 总摄群仙制召河源班。 右中央符九字。 西方素天白帝七门金灵皓映太华流氛白石峨峨七气氤氲上有始生皇老大神总领肺气主校九天检定图录制召上仙太白检肺奎娄守魂胃勖毕赀主制七关参总斗魁受符北元赤书玉字九天正文摄召万气普归帝君西山神咒八威七传符水上龙召山送云在所校录同到帝门辅卫上真斩灭邪源若有不祥截以金关赤书符命风火驿传。 右西方一百三十六字。 行真摄正万神焉。 右西方符七字。 北方玄天五气徘徊中有黑帝双皇太微总领符命仙炼八威青裙羽龙文凤衣上帝所举制到玉阶北辰辅肾斗牛卫扉女虚危室豁落四开壁总七星执凶纠非缺灾扫秽明道洞辉北山神咒激阳起雷流铃焕落玃天振威北酆所部万妖灭摧九河倾竭乌母群飞蛟龙通道水陌洞开赤文玉字驿龙风驰。 右北方一百二十字。 玄高玉清摄北酆龙。 右北方符八字。 日月以定山水以开三天大度群真徘徊。 右青帝十六字。 玉音吐气三素以御保命定仙玉历定封。 右赤帝十六字。 总召天地九元以判同系五气上帝遥睹。 右黄帝十六字。 策驾五老西眄九都亿劫同会明定九河。 右白帝十六字。 罗天北斗定会九期景散八极明石玄慈。 右黑帝十六字。 天灵步兵太一升天在地开日生天命威命主尸星地命出日月天地度。 右真文策面二十八字。 慧昌斩开山度人。 右腹板七字。 无上大真上道统御三天灵文洪灾度人开道杀魔。 右策杖符二十字。 召鬼玉帝九天升玄元星。 右八威策十字。 亶娄阿苍无和观音须延明首法揽菩昙稼那阿奕忽诃流吟华都曲丽鲜菩育臻答落大梵散烟庆云飞洒玉都明魔上门无行上首回跖流玄阿陁龙罗四象吁员。 六十四字。 南爓洞浮玉眸铣谈梵形落空九灵推前泽洛菩台绿罗大千眇莽九丑韶谣缘邅云上九都飞生自骞那育郁馥摩罗法轮霐持无镜揽资运容馥朗廓奕神缨自宫。 六十四字。 刃利禅猷婆泥咎通宛薮涤色太眇之堂流罗梵萌景蔚萧嵎易邈无寂宛首少都阿滥郁竺华莫延由九开自辩阿那品首无量扶盖浮罗合神玉诞长桑□空度仙。
chunks.translated_text:
The Seventy-Eight Graphs.
The Numinous Treasure Lord’s surname and taboo name.

**Eastern Direction (120 graphs):**
The Nine Qi’s Primordial Sovereign of the Azure Heaven, the Green Radiance, and the Towering Guardians—within them dwells an Elder who oversees the celestial registers and commands qi to summon immortals. The Year Star assists the liver; Horn, Neck, and the Four Quarters’ revolving scenes are governed by Winnowing Basket, master of the Seven Luminaries. The Dipper’s bright wheel receives qi, seizing the false and sweeping away calamities. The Eastern Mountain’s divine incantation summons the Nine Heavens’ Red Script talismans to bind Fengdu, restrain demons, and dispatch ghosts—none dare evade execution. All are sent to the Wood Palace. Should any delay, the Eastern River and the Vast Sea’s water spirits shall be constrained: great kalpas of floods, dragons bearing disasters, and the Water Palace’s paths—hundreds and thousands of passages—shall be opened by the Supreme Emperor’s Red Writ amid the primordial wind and fire.

**Eastern Direction Talisman (16 graphs):**
The Nine Qi’s Azure Heaven illuminates the true Dao; the Jade Talisman commands qi, treasured by all perfected beings.

**Southern Direction (148 graphs):**
Within the Vermilion Heaven’s Crimson Emperor and Jade Hall resides a great spirit named the Crimson Sovereign, whose blazing flames and threefold qi radiate brilliance. Immortals receive their mandate in accord with destiny; the Great Fire Star assists the heart. Well and Ghost guard Chamber; Willow, Star, Spread, and Wing resist the Four Quarters. The Seven Lodgings revolve, the celestial constant summoned to hasten convergence upon the true Dao. The Red Writ commands spirits; the north binds Fengdu, dispatching demonic lineages and severing evil roots. The talisman’s decree punishes clearly, enumerating crimes. The Southern Mountain’s divine incantation subdues the Eight Directions’ myriad demons, annihilating all trials. The Southern River’s Water Emperor, Great Earl, and Dragon Kings’ incantations circulate, universally sweeping away inauspicious floods and flying disasters. Dragons are summoned to open and clear waterways—thousands of paths, myriad passages. Should any dare transgress, they shall be sent to the Fire Palace by the Red Writ’s proclamation; none may disobey.

**Southern Direction Talisman (8 graphs):**
The Primordial Supreme Emperor opens Heaven and Earth.

**Central Direction (144 graphs):**
The Yellow High Heaven’s Central Numinous One, the Primordial, gives birth to the Five Elders. The August Highest commands qi, supervises the perfected, and oversees the immortals’ records and mysterious charts. Jade Writs hasten the ascent of qi, universally notifying the myriad spirits. The Quelling Star assists the spleen; the Northern Culmen revolves, mastering the false and severing evil roots. Dust is swept away, miasmas dispelled. The Mysterious Dipper’s bright degrees traverse the Celestial Pass. The Nine Heavens’ talismanic commands are transmitted by the Golden Horse Post, constraining the Northern Emperor to block the Ghost Gate and excise inauspiciousness. None may stand before it. The Central Mountain’s divine incantation summons dragons to ascend clouds, converging upon the Yellow River’s nine streams. The river’s source may not overflow; good and evil are distinguished. A thousand demons and myriad deceits face the Emperor Lord. Should any dare transgress, the Great Yang’s scorching flames shall burn the Red Writ’s jade graphs, proclaiming universally.

**Central Direction Talisman (9 graphs):**
Master all immortals, command and summon the river’s source.

**Western Direction (136 graphs):**
The White Emperor of the Pale Heaven’s Seven Gates, the Golden Numinous One, shines resplendently. The Great Hua’s flowing vapors and the towering White Stone’s sevenfold qi billow upward. There dwells the Primordial Elder, a great spirit who oversees lung qi, governs the Nine Heavens’ registers, and commands the ascent of immortals. The Great White Star inspects the lungs; Straddler and Harvester guard the soul; Stomach, Mane, and Net assist. The Seven Passes are mastered by the Three Stars; the Dipper’s handle receives talismans. The Northern Culmen’s Red Writ and jade graphs, the Nine Heavens’ true script, summon the myriad qi to return universally to the Emperor Lord. The Western Mountain’s divine incantation, the Eight Might’s Seven Transmissions, summons dragons from waters and clouds from mountains, all converging at the Emperor’s gate to assist and guard the perfected. Evil roots are severed. Should any inauspiciousness arise, it shall be cut off by the Golden Pass. The Red Writ’s talismanic commands are transmitted by wind and fire.

**Western Direction Talisman (7 graphs):**
Advance the true, command the correct, and all spirits obey.

**Northern Direction (120 graphs):**
The Dark Heaven’s Five Qi meander; within dwell the Black Emperor and the Twin Sovereigns of the Great Subtlety, who oversee talismanic commands. Immortals refine the Eight Might, clad in azure skirts and feathered capes, dragon-patterned and phoenix-robed. The Supreme Emperor’s decrees ascend the Jade Stairs. The Northern Culmen assists the kidneys; Dipper and Oxguard defend the gates; Girl, Void, Rooftop, and Encampment open the Four Quarters. The Seven Stars grasp the baleful, rectify the false, and sweep away calamities, illuminating the Dao with penetrating radiance. The Northern Mountain’s divine incantation stirs yang to summon thunder, flowing bells, and blazing meteors. The Heavenly Ape shakes the heavens with might. The Northern Fengdu’s legions—myriad demons—are annihilated. The Nine Rivers drain dry; the Crow Mother’s flock scatters. Dragons open waterways; paths are cleared. The Red Writ’s jade graphs are transmitted by galloping dragons and racing winds.

**Northern Direction Talisman (8 graphs):**
The Mysterious Highest and Jade Clarity command the Northern Fengdu’s dragons.

**The Five Directions’ Closing Writs:**
The sun and moon fix the mountains and waters; the Three Heavens’ great measures cause the myriad perfected to meander. *(Azure Emperor, 16 graphs)*
Jade tones exhale qi; the Three Primes govern, preserving life and determining immortality. The Jade Calendar seals and fixes. *(Crimson Emperor, 16 graphs)*
Summon Heaven and Earth’s Nine Origins to judge and unite the Five Qi; the Supreme Emperor gazes afar. *(Yellow Emperor, 16 graphs)*
The Five Elders’ chariots survey the Nine Capitals; kalpas beyond count converge, illuminating and fixing the Nine Rivers. *(White Emperor, 16 graphs)*
The Heavenly Net and Northern Dipper fix the Nine Appointments; radiance scatters to the Eight Extremes, the Mysterious Compassion Stone. *(Black Emperor, 16 graphs)*

**True Writ’s Frontispiece (28 graphs):**
The Heavenly Numinous Foot-Soldiers ascend to Heaven; on Earth, the sun’s birth opens the day. The Mandate of Heaven commands might; the Master of Corpses and the Earth’s Mandate emerge. The sun, moon, Heaven, and Earth measure.

**Abdominal Plate (7 graphs):**
Brilliant prosperity cleaves mountains to deliver humanity.

**Staff Talisman (20 graphs):**
The Supreme Great Perfected, the Highest Dao, governs the Three Heavens’ numinous writs, delivering humanity from great calamities, opening paths, and slaying demons.

**Eight Might’s Staff (10 graphs):**
Summon ghosts, Jade Emperor, Nine Heavens, ascend the Primordial Star.

**Incantation (64 graphs):**
Dānlóu, Ācāng, Wúhé, Guānyīn, Xūyán, Míngshǒu, Fǎlǎn, Pútán, Jiànà, Āyì, Hūhē, Liúyín, Huādū, Qūlì, Xiānpú, Yùzhēn, Dāluò, Dàfàn, Sànyān, Qìngyún, Fēisǎ, Yùdū, Míngmó, Shàngmén, Wúxíng, Shàngshǒu, Huízhí, Liúxuán, Ātuó, Lóngluó, Sìxiàng, Xūyuán.

**Incantation (64 graphs):**
Nányán, Dòngfú, Yùmóu, Xiǎntán, Fànxíng, Luòkōng, Jiǔlíng, Tuīqián, Zéluò, Pútái, Lǜluó, Dàqiān, Miǎomǎng, Jiǔchǒu, Sháoyáo, Yuánzhān, Yúnshàng, Jiǔdū, Fēishēng, Zìqiān, Nàyù, Yùfù, Móluó, Fǎlún, Hóngchí, Wújìng, Lǎnzī, Yùnróng, Fùlǎng, Kuòyì, Shényīng, Zìgōng.

**Incantation (64 graphs):**
Rènlì, Chányóu, Póní, Jiùtōng, Wǎnsǒu, Díshǎi, Tàimiǎo, Zhītáng, Liúluó, Fànméng, Jǐngwèi, Xiāoyú, Yìmiǎo, Wújì, Wǎnshǒu, Shǎodū, Ālàn, Yùzhú, Huámò, Yányóu, Jiǔkāi, Zìbiàn, Ānà, Pǐnshǒu, Wúliàng, Fúgài, Fúluó, Héshén, Yùdàn, Chángsāng, Kōngdù, Xiān.

nter all the river and mountain forty-eight seats. The celestial and earthly various maidens’ talismans arrive as summoned. The Jade Maiden, Charming Maiden, Purple Radiance, Mysterious Essence, River Wondrous One, the Five Azure Pearls, the Nine Heavens’ parents—send names urgently as commanded. The Celestial Chancellor, the Most High Divine One—once the memorial arrives, hasten as the statutes command.

**[The Five Peaks comprise 164 graphs. The Five Peaks together total one hundred graphs.]**

chunks.original_text: 六十四字。 玃无自育九日道乾坤母东覆形摄上玄陁罗育邈眇气合云飞天大丑总监上天沙陁劫量龙汉瑛鲜碧落浮黎空歌保珍恶奕无品洞妙自真元梵恢漠幽寂度人。 六十四字。 右内音录字二百五十六字。 武齿成拂由肃天门波狂赫张布徐真事。 右八景录魔讳十六字。 上天虚无玄洞九五太上阿房统灵灭尸玉衡摄气总华玄观统御上部通神达古。 右上部三十二字。 赤明开真三天气和洞丹阳光五藏不枯三气所宝朱宫扶苏纳炼流泉生元无殂。 右中部三十二字。 中黄理气元生自尊胃管幽通六府俱存白元公子桃康德淳养育朱丹洞神往还。 右下部三十二字。 青天总气元始上精直符守吏制御酆山召龙负水群魔送迎运交氐宿与我俱仙。 右上部八符三十二字。 中始太真五灵高尊八朗兴云所诛元蠲五色蔚勃出幽入冥诸天供奉神升上清。 右中部八符三十二字。 罗佩四门所呼立前日月五星七元诸天倾河负水豁落火铃召制群魔风驰束行。 右下部八符三十二字。 日月七星三天合元九祖父母太真科明仙人玉女道洞八千七宝镇灵师某甲度某甲魂生无同盟。 右八景都符字三十九字。 东明都官召录青天徘徊星宿二气朗分南生百辽三气乘玄召真躬伏莫不辅灵西乘佩真玉道勅素禁制虎豹纲维定布北玄大神统乘元纲七斗回转百魔自藏中御八方豁落龙飞左佩火铃天罗伉辉。 右五称大字八十字。 三皇九元上帝晶。 右策面七字。 金真八道上清玄元甲巳御运九灵推前豁落缨络素枭三晨五岳四渍通河彻源。 右八威大字三十二字。 龙飞九道百亿水符大小阳九四极运周指空召灵氛然同游。 右大劫二十四字。 无上大真道中统御三天总会魔精保举。 右运度十六字。 东方青牙服食青牙饮以朝霞。 南方朱丹服食朱丹饮以丹池。 中央戊己昂昂太山服食元气饮以醴泉。 西方明石服食明石饮以灵液。 北方玄滋服食玄滋饮以玉饴。 无死之原无死之玄无死始无死空无死分无生上无生下无生左无生右无生气五气转空生空出空入以为盟生气左死气右两半成一受气券约信誓。 右定志六十字。 金华玉堂北斗玄精左见日月右带扶生三台七星奎娄观明胃勖定录毕觜还参井鬼柳张飞步南亭星翼轸定角亢御龙氏房基同克名金宫斗牛始制女虚危室壁方度世南斗楼堂摧华盖主精炼三元五气同生变化无空上。 右飞行三界八十九字。 上元文曰：洞房延生命灵虚空书玉文龙龙汉大劫周上元宫度人种生始青上元无结成延生文都统三十二天帝其文一名同天混真录一名洞秘天书一名延生文。 中元文曰：空中书无常形结中元号招灵文结虚无以羽生召无魂升天庭大劫文通赤明校金简定仙名其一名洞虚灵金书录一名九幽生神章一名招灵文。 下元文曰：元洞漫瀚大洞水府渊玉河伯冥灵神文太空下元制水源万灵八威摄群龙文行三气明真召乌母度天灾大劫同升天宫其文一名洞神威灵三元录一名天门大字玉书一名明真文玉符。 右三元延生三符合二百五字。 洞真名姓讳。 玉清上真五老同生因气以定明检上皇校录三天以动北酆三十六部回转其中蔚起百六飞玄云龙都录姓玄川名武龙。 右玉清文四十八字。 告盟九天高上宝经刻名帝位列字九天依保我命灵山所藏一意和同以师告为盟日月映照外明内鲜不得泄文七祖兆身长充火乡二十四狱风刀往还。

chunks.original_text: 右帝录六十一字。 谱录二洞混开明道沌阐喘浪澜杓杓勃随夕勒提头庆携须任持苏越凝泓灵渊定拔正贤造雾基高欣平宁怜智齐辉爓欣平渊盈法综通洞景游昌澄珠瑛师庆翁京云延罂寂范明戏飞光止婆生羽辉影萌近兰奔椿献休育瑛云艳灵候度蒿厉鲜伤嶒京督度景度升度招生瑛崇求陷普仙披京向谐扉迅碧欻霞泰羽留甥升通灵鲁紫堂英松婴穹瑛幸恭遂兰从。 右普录讳一百四十四字。 正明太全三上九方青宫仙官九人。 东方十四字。 南导火天赤气流系三天九人。 南方十二字。 司命日月火天制神素山徘正九人。 中央＋四字。 西素三天素皇主功九人。 西方十字。 司命日月星辰大天制神素山正非九人。 北方十六字。 右奉迎五符六十六字。 九原太华徘徊昆仑太真上仙出入生门不死之道三天正文五老上帝收捕不祥日月三光五斗为明。 右左童上录四十玉字。 众星渧有叩齐弋泔行命延逃建大力昱持火炅制御我极逐的紫洋扇弋原白寅申卯酉检命秉三太皇八玄元生申服冻赫未叶悼洞品侧加他太奎高富逐恶除气逃灵峨郩鳻一老康仁王三天告命天化气承灵数法百年三代相推清爽皆迁汝独何为沉伏世间昨被帝命检校稽延何不速去留可暂申别告北酆摄送魔身上天皇灵混沌无形三十九帝五老上清白吉启晨高仙散精八景徘徊三元迅琼流真下降瞻眄虚庭敢以玉文上告太灵三官校录玉检隐文三元内名思幽念神未睹真形而求上仙高玄来映九天之精洞监於万总统众经五老上真解释宿根拔度七玄而承此文三元下教位登仙王以付太华长生之君东华老子南极尊神西台中侯北帝中真九灵王子太灵玉童九天上帝自然真文隐讳宝录其中万神卫送出入虚空游飞常扬与帝合明大灾荡荡万气不全玄名有录得见真灵秘则飞仙泄堕九泉七祖相牵同填河源乘云回转自然羽裙朱日定籍还至金门王帝寥寥慎行勿忘三元太素洞玄表文求亨高虚同资霐文。 右检天录三百七十六字。 三元玄上上台玉检紫文三宝自然九天真星检地之录三元山君帝书六天黄老制御山川上真阴阳灵录三元检文大洞真书三元玉光斗文齐真书隐郁绝玄乌虎书天命灵都紫素玄宫飞玄羽衣天文奉宣九天上帝高上玉检北酆刻三元灵命飞天检文晨极之台飞天中书三元万名龙书三元书玄题上三始主禁虎书上天飞金牖之室中书元天九天上空父母隐文凤生值符太素厥讳莹字元庚黄素厥讳林字大济白素厥讳晃字虚。 右检天录符一百七十四字。 玉朱明胎龙上玄九光仙芝玉皇间长谷八垂飞朱钱通膏姹女下入渊云光神童成九变水澧长源流浩瀚三天真君来作镇内户丈人为神建紫罗大夫迎东灵云华六一入金城五光交驰遂孩婴丹液焕发致太平抱以碧酒乃长生仙光俱升天气明径入绛阙理百精长与三王入太清咸启带书券无泄零从容九微使六丁神女卫护永相保北谒仙都登沧岛太虚司命定筹寿玄元天帝使九老奉录来下入五府三天役神主召取元精母玄气父六城登必永寿承天地独长久载真玄谒元始十天广周乃见纪。 右检地录二百玉字。 甲乙杀鬼都伯吏姓宋名巨映。 丙丁杀鬼都伯吏姓支筒名法生。 戊己杀鬼都伯吏姓帛名西子留。 一云庚辛。 庚辛杀鬼都伯吏姓黄名安正理。 一云戊己。 壬癸杀鬼都伯吏姓郑名玄丘伯。 右检地录符六十四字。 别本如此。
chunks.translated_text:
**Celestial Register (61 graphs):**

**Comprehensive Register of the Two Caverns (144 graphs):**
Hùn-kāi míng Dào, dùn chǎn chuǎn làng, lán sháo sháo bó, suí xī lè tí tóu. Qìng xié xū, rèn chí Sū Yuè, níng hóng líng yuān, dìng bá zhèng xián. Zào wù jī, gāo xīn píng níng, lián zhì qí huī, yàn xīn píng yuān yíng. Fǎ zōng tōng dòng, jǐng yóu chāng, chéng zhū yīng. Shī qìng wēng jīng, yún yán yīng, jì fàn míng xì. Fēi guāng zhǐ pó, shēng yǔ huī, yǐng méng jìn lán, bēn chūn xiàn xiū. Yù yīng yùn yàn, líng hòu dù hāo, lì xiān shāng céng. Jīng dū dù jǐng, dù shēng yīng, chóng qiú xiàn pǔ. Xiān pī jīng, xiàng xié fēi, xùn bì xū xiá, tài yǔ liú shēng. Shēng tōng líng, lǔ zǐ táng, yīng sōng yīng qióng, yìng gōng suì lán cóng.

**Comprehensive Register of Taboo Names (144 graphs):**

**True Clarity, Grand Perfection, Threefold Uppermost, Nine Directions, Azure Palace Immortals (9 persons):**

**East (14 graphs):**
**South (12 graphs):**

**West (10 graphs):**

**North (16 graphs):**

**Five Talismans for Reverent Reception (66 graphs):**
Nine Origins, Grand Florescence, Pacing the Void of Kunlun, Supreme Perfected and Transcendent, Exiting and Entering the Gate of Life, the Deathless Dao. Three Heavens’ True Writ, Five Venerables, Supreme Thearch, Capturing and Seizing Inauspiciousness. Sun, Moon, and Three Luminaries, Five Dipper Stars as Illumination.

**Left Youth’s Upper Register (40 jade graphs):**
Multitudinous stars drip and converge, all responding in unison. Yi and Gan traverse the mandate, prolonging flight. Establishing great power, Yu holds fast to fiery radiance, regulating and governing my utmost. Pursuing the target, Purple Ocean fans the origin. White Tiger, Yin, Shen, Mao, and You inspect destiny, grasping the Three Supreme August Ones, Eight Mysterious Origins of life. Shen serves frozen brilliance, Wei mourns the cave’s ranks, adding to the other. Supreme Strider, exalted abundance, expelling malign qi, fleeing numinous peril. One Elder, Kang Ren Wang, Three Heavens proclaim the mandate. Heaven transforms qi, receiving numinous reckoning. The law of a hundred years, three generations mutually advancing, all ascend in purity and clarity—why alone do you remain submerged in the world? Yesterday, by imperial command, inspection and verification were extended. Why not swiftly depart? You may briefly remain to declare your separation. Proclaim to the Northern Feng, dispatching the demonic body. Ascend to the Heavenly Thearch’s numinous primal chaos, formless. Thirty-nine Emperors, Five Venerables of Highest Clarity, white auspiciousness unfolds at dawn. Exalted Transcendents scatter essence, Eight Effulgences pacing the void. Three Primordials swiftly flow with jade-like truth, descending to gaze upon the empty courtyard. Daring to present this jade writ, I report above to the Three Numinous Officials. The jade tally records the hidden writ, the Three Primordials’ inner names. Contemplate the obscure, invoke the spirits, though you have not beheld their true forms, yet seek the exalted Transcendent. Lofty Mystery comes to reflect the essence of the Nine Heavens, overseeing the myriad in the Cavern’s governance. The Five Venerables and Supreme Perfected explain karmic roots, delivering the Seven Mysteries. Bearing this writ, the Three Primordials instruct below, ascending to the rank of Transcendent King. It is conferred upon the Lord of Longevity of Grand Florescence, the Eastern Florescence Venerable, the Southern Culmen Honored Deity, the Western Terrace Central Attendant, the Northern Thearch Central Perfected, the Nine Numinous Kingly Youth, the Jade Youth of the Supreme Numinous, the Nine Heavens’ Thearch. The natural true writ, hidden taboo, precious register—within it, myriad spirits guard and escort, exiting and entering the void, soaring and flying, ever manifesting in union with the Thearch. Great calamities are swept away, myriad qi incomplete. Mysterious names are recorded; those who behold the true numinous, if they leak the secret, will fall as Transcendents. Seven ancestors will be dragged along, together filling the river’s source. Riding clouds in revolution, naturally clad in feathered skirts, crimson sun fixed in the register, returning to the Golden Gate. Thearch Wang, vast and solitary, act with caution, forget not the Three Primordials, Grand Simplicity, Cavern Mystery’s manifest writ. Seek prosperity in the lofty void, together relying on the vast writ.

**Celestial Tally Register (376 graphs):**
Three Primordials, Mysterious Uppermost, Upper Terrace, Jade Tally, Purple Writ, Three Treasures, Natural Nine Heavens’ True Star Tally, Earth’s Register. Three Primordials’ Mountain Lords, Thearch’s Writ, Six Heavens’ Yellow Venerable, Regulating and Governing Mountains and Rivers. Supreme Perfected, Yin-Yang Numinous Register, Three Primordials’ Tally Writ, Grand Cavern True Book, Three Primordials’ Jade Radiance Dipper Writ, Equal Truth Book, Hidden and Profound, Cutting Off Mystery. Black Bird and Tiger Writ, Heaven’s Mandate, Numinous Capital, Purple Simplicity, Mysterious Palace, Flying Mystery Feathered Robe, Heavenly Writ. Reverently proclaimed by the Nine Heavens’ Thearch, Highest Jade Tally. Northern Feng engraves the Three Primordials’ Numinous Mandate, Flying Heaven Tally Writ, Morning Culmen Terrace, Flying Heaven Central Writ. Three Primordials’ Myriad Names, Dragon Writ, Three Primordials’ Writ, Mysterious Inscription. Upper Three Beginnings, Master of Prohibitions, Tiger Writ. Upper Heaven, Flying Golden Casement Chamber, Central Writ, Primordial Heaven. Nine Heavens’ Upper Void, Father and Mother, Hidden Writ. Phoenix Born, Encountering Talisman, Grand Simplicity’s Taboo, Lustrous Character, Primordial Geng. Yellow Simplicity’s Taboo, Forest Character, Great Aid. White Simplicity’s Taboo, Radiant Character, Void.

**Celestial Tally Register Talismans (174 graphs):**
Jade Vermilion Embryo Dragon, Upper Mystery, Nine Radiance Transcendent Mushroom. Jade Thearch amidst the Long Valley, Eight Pendants Flying, Vermilion Coin penetrating the fat. Alchemical Maiden descending into the abyss, cloud radiance, divine youth accomplishing nine transformations. Water’s profound source flows vast, Three Heavens’ True Lords come to guard within. Household Elder as spirit, establishing the Purple Net Great Man, welcoming the Eastern Numinous Cloud Florescence. Six Ones enter the Golden City, five lights crisscrossing, then the infant and elixir, cinnabar liquid gleaming, bringing Great Peace. Embracing azure wine, thus attaining longevity. Transcendent radiance together ascends, heavenly qi brightening the path, entering the Crimson Gate. Governing the hundred spirits, ever accompanying the Three Kings into Grand Clarity. All open the sash, bearing the writ and tally, no leakage permitted. Leisurely with Nine Subtleties, employing the Six Ding spirit maidens for protection, eternally safeguarding. Northward, pay homage to the Transcendent Capital, ascending the Azure Isle, Grand Void. Controller of Destiny fixes the tally, prolonging life. Mysterious Origin Heavenly Thearch commands the Nine Venerables to receive the register, descending into the Five Bureaus, Three Heavens. Employing spirits, summoning primordial essence, Mother of Mysterious Qi, Father of the Six Cities. Ascend and be eternally long-lived, inheriting Heaven and Earth alone, enduring forever. Bearing true mystery, pay homage to the Primordial Beginning. Ten Heavens’ vast expanse, then behold the record.

**Earthly Register (200 jade graphs):**

**Register of Earthly Tally Talismans (64 graphs):**
Jia-Yi slays the ghost capital’s constable, surname Song, given name Ju Ying.
Bing-Ding slays the ghost capital’s constable, surname Zhi, given name Fa Sheng.

chunks.original_text: 玄微九登仙神得生长保地□山张苟鬼食头金人雷张海吹风入柱金子文呜炎元上高生养食师真兽叩君侍灵算主何儒上电担益爱太长真平豹太天山天中上天飞虎衔身中集精元黄九上天石尔破禽紫上中游玄首啖从山剥微真理无灵目自兽贱凿朱来气永千四猛天踊齿宫监九津使刀斧使百衡称又微主人天牙山虚她太上玄和丈牙马兵行矍平元城太元长万众飞天猛赤精既下口走海走巅兽子总延生九兵行附牙四十卫尔形躯我抗魂强父八文蛟羊蹋辰斗付禽在我备仙神长益气命。 右检仙录二百五字。 太上众元录上清除六天真文三天正法三天九微玄都太真阴阳灵录上元章蓬莱太玄九流真书神虎玄洞。 右符四十三字。 九玄元气生自然炼化八道含胎仙结落紫虚秀玉轩乘运御气历天门登上九户入北关三部上真命盟文各千百人。 右八素交带四十六字。 太上黄中理气九微玄城精既太上和主命永无逝九天长算灵侍爱中元上真来监又上元赤子总延生下元丈人使千灵玄上飞真主养生高上元君益天精紫微朱宫称太平猛兽四十卫尔形躯我九口长牙天力四目首吞虎平河食金柱八风吹海张炎扣担山焦禽剥鉴源衔蛇婴天巅牙父入文蛟半蹋辰斗抗丘走万马牙斧猛目炎石卫貌舞狮子金头食鬼苟张山□地雷呜兽电天牛破山赋踊百灵行飞走附强禽在我备尔神长益气命付魂行海及丘山使兽从尔身太上真文丈人保我生长得神仙上登九微玄。 右太微黄书二百四玉字。 元始天皇明如正道玉符摄气太上保身至天普地以济正老君愿制上文草天地开也行气真正制除百精三灾至时逍遥玉清普同载度言名帝庭莫不部翊齐到玉庭得过大难。 右青箓白简七十玉字。 元始生未天之先玄气之中混沌无形一日九变至上青气号无名之君九合百六称教十方天帝大运九造明仙化上道以我元生一劫回转三天中治皇上日月始开阴阳天帝以天帝三十二天主人命未明真天皇帝无上光星称北南更受事元光火帝明日月受气真正天帝文明星中合命分印日帝行天取上合生我回命真十方百日收凶厄天帝取真一何易明天日太玄皇帝四天合二十日天力千日太上太上精皇三山上三光巡光明天命九徘徊愿我仙乾坤元气明天地皇帝皇帝太上太上命神力太帝上道光命力元帝君命太上光命皇天太上九天太上上帝日月以明天帝君命三玄上元天地日月光无上无万重皇帝命无上三天天帝清真上太元天命帝君重称皇命上上上命小命皇命帝上命太上太上日月皇同王母天命元君九天上帝元生上天帝日月乾天人太上无量天帝君命非尸生制百灵皇帝命天帝阳西升玄化升度太阳左带日精永承太阳上三天帝皇阳明天仙人玉女太上天帝君天帝山保元一日月力天大帝号太阳启始金木河洞大天上帝金真明真光本命三元命合九天上帝制万神天帝元阳中明天王上命玄元上真光阳帝太始建元太上光君言天帝明老命大吉帝命保度生气九天山明王上君五帝阳山太圣帝气。 右元始谱录四百五十八字。 上天金辰玉帝明王天老元气三气上王天生九真金日玄气黄玉女生江西王母水河天元夫王生气天帝井日星甲乙王火土水金气三气龙气三神太一河上王龙火变朱明太上帝上上玉明玄元光君三皇四天帝明石君九天太上白元九江水帝五气君大天小天黑甲乙戊己君制三天命上玉帝气气君太上中老太乙四宫元君玉宝六日天非大君光水火天木信三气自然命会九天上帝明王道君三天正法。
chunks.translated_text:
**Register of Transcendent Records (205 jade graphs):**

Mysterious Subtlety ascends ninefold—transcendent spirits attain life, eternally safeguarding the earth’s □ Mountain. Zhang Gou, the ghost-devouring demon, consumes heads; the Golden Man summons thunder. Zhang Hai’s winds blow into pillars; Golden Child Wen wails as flames rise to the Primordial Above. Highborn life is nurtured, consuming the Master’s true beasts. Bow to the Lord, attend the spirit-calculus sovereign. What scholar ascends the lightning, bearing the augmenting love of the Great Eternal? The True Leveler, the Leopard of the Great Heavenly Mountain, soars in the Central Heaven. The Flying Tiger clenches its body, gathering essence and primordial yellow. Nine ascend to the Heavenly Stone, shattering birds in purple’s midst. Roaming the central mystery, the Dark Chief devours from the mountain, stripping subtlety’s true pattern. No spirit-eye sees the beast’s base; the vermilion comes, qi eternal. Four thousand fierce ones leap in heaven, their fangs in the palace. The Nine Ford Envoys wield blades and axes; the Hundred Scales proclaim the subtle master. Heaven’s Fang Mountain is void—she, the Supreme Dark Harmony. The Yard-Long Fang and Horse-Soldiers march, seizing the Leveler of Primordial City. The Great Primordial’s myriad hosts take flight—fierce crimson essence descends, mouths fleeing to sea and peak. Beast-children gather, life extended. Nine soldiers march, clinging to fangs. Forty-four guard you; your form and body resist me. The soul’s strength, the father’s eight texts—Jiao the Dragon and Ram tread the celestial Dipper, delivering birds to me. Prepared, transcendent spirits lengthen and augment qi and life.

**Register of Supreme Multitudes (Upper Clarity’s Expulsion of the Six Heavens’ True Writ, Three Heavens’ Orthodox Dharma, Three Heavens’ Nine Subtleties, Mysterious Capital’s Supreme Perfection, Yin-Yang Numinous Record, Upper Prime Chapter, Penglai’s Supreme Mystery, Nine Streams’ True Book, Divine Tiger’s Mysterious Cavern):**
*(43 graphs)*

Ninefold Mysterious Qi engenders spontaneous refinement and transformation. The Eight Paths contain the embryonic transcendent, knotting and descending in Purple Void’s jade radiance. Riding the current, steering qi, traversing Heaven’s Gate, ascending the Nine Portals, entering the Northern Pass—Three Departments’ Supreme Perfection commands the covenant writ. Each of a thousand and a hundred.

**Eightfold Simplicity’s Interwoven Girdle:**
*(46 graphs)*

The Supreme Yellow Center governs qi, Nine Subtleties’ Mysterious City’s essence. The Supreme Harmony’s sovereign commands life, eternally unvanishing. Nine Heavens’ long calculus, numinous attendants’ love—Central Prime’s Supreme Perfection descends to oversee. Again, Upper Prime’s Crimson Child gathers and extends life. Lower Prime’s Elder dispatches a thousand spirits. Mysterious Above’s Flying Perfection governs nurturance. Highest Upper Prime Lord augments Heaven’s essence. Purple Subtlety’s Vermilion Palace proclaims Great Peace. Fierce beasts, forty-four, guard you. Your form and body—our nine mouths, long fangs, Heaven’s strength, four eyes—devour tigers, level rivers, consume golden pillars. Eight winds blow; the sea stretches. Flames strike, burdens scorch mountains, birds are flayed, mirrors probe sources. Snakes are clenched, infants mount Heaven’s peaks. Fang-fathers enter textual dragons, half-treading the celestial Dipper. Resisting hills, fleeing myriad horses, fang-axes fierce-eyed—flaming stones guard appearances. Lions dance, golden heads devour ghosts. Gou Zhang of the mountain’s □ earth, thunder roars, beasts howl, lightning splits heaven. Oxen shatter mountains, leaping spirits fly, clinging fiercely. Birds prepared within me—transcendent spirits lengthen and augment qi and life, entrusting souls to traverse seas and hills, dispatching beasts to follow your body. The Supreme True Writ’s Elder safeguards my life’s growth, attaining transcendence. Ascend the Nine Subtleties’ Mystery.

**Supreme Subtlety’s Yellow Writ:**
*(204 jade graphs)*

Primordial Heavenly August One shines like the Orthodox Dao’s jade tally, absorbing qi. The Supreme safeguards the body, reaching heaven and pervading earth to succor the upright. The Elder Lord enacts the supreme writ, initiating heaven and earth. Conducting qi in true orthodoxy, it expels a hundred spirits and the Three Calamities. In due time, carefree in Jade Clarity, universally borne together, it conveys names to the Emperor’s Court. None fail to assemble and assist, arriving at the Jade Court to surmount great trials.

**Azure Register, White Slip:**
*(70 jade graphs)*

Primordial Beginning arose before the Unborn Heaven, amid Mysterious Qi’s chaos, formless. In a single day, nine transformations—reaching the Supreme Azure Qi, styled the Nameless Lord. Nine unions, a hundred and six assemblies, proclaimed teachings to the Ten Directions’ Heavenly Emperors. The Great Revolution’s nine creations illuminated transcendent transformations. The Upper Dao, with my primordial birth, revolved for one kalpa, cycling through the Three Heavens’ governance. August Above’s sun and moon first opened yin and yang. Heavenly Emperors, with the Thirty-Two Heavens’ masters, commanded the Unilluminated Perfection’s Heavenly August Emperor. Supreme Radiant Star, styled North-South Alternating Service. Primordial Radiance Fire Emperor, Sun and Moon receiving qi, True Orthodox Heavenly Emperor. Luminous Star’s central union commands life’s division, imprinting the Solar Emperor’s celestial conduct. Ascending to unite with the Upper Birth, my revolving life’s true ten directions and hundred days gather inauspicious calamities. Heavenly Emperors seize the True One—how easily the Heavenly Sun’s Supreme Mystery shines! Four Heavens unite with twenty days’ heavenly strength, a thousand days’ Supreme August Essence Emperor. Three Mountains’ Upper Three Lights patrol radiant heaven, commanding nine circuits. May my transcendent Qian-Kun’s primordial qi illuminate Heaven and Earth’s August Emperor. August Emperor Supreme August commands divine power. Supreme Dao’s radiant life-force, Primordial Emperor Lord commands Supreme August’s radiant life. August Heaven’s Supreme Nine Heavens’ Supreme Thearch, Sun and Moon illuminating Heavenly Emperor Lord commands Three Mysteries’ Upper Prime. Heaven and Earth, Sun and Moon’s radiance—Supreme, boundless myriad layers. August Emperor commands Supreme Three Heavens’ Heavenly Emperor, Pure Perfection’s Supreme Primordial Heaven commands Emperor Lord. Repeatedly styled August Command, Supreme Supreme Supreme Command, Lesser Command, August Command, Emperor’s Supreme Command. Supreme August Sun and Moon’s August Co-Ruler, Heavenly Mother commands Primordial Lord. Nine Heavens’ Supreme Thearch, Primordial Birth’s Upper Heavenly Emperor. Sun and Moon’s Qian Heaven’s people, Boundless Heavenly Emperor Lord commands. Not corpse-born, it governs a hundred spirits. August Emperor commands Heavenly Emperor. Yang ascends the west, mysterious transformation ascends and conveys. Left-belted Solar Essence eternally bears the Supreme Sun’s Upper Three Heavens’ August Emperor. Yang Brightness Heaven’s transcendent men and jade women, Supreme Heavenly Emperor Lord. Heavenly Emperor Mountain safeguards the primordial. One day’s sun and moon’s strength, Heaven’s Great Emperor, styled Solar Initiator. Metal, Wood, River, Cavern—Great Heavenly Thearch. Golden Perfection, Illuminated Perfection’s radiant root-life. Three Primes’ life unites with Nine Heavens’ Supreme Thearch, governing myriad spirits. Heavenly Emperor Primordial Yang’s central illumination, Heavenly King commands. Mysterious Primordial’s Supreme Perfection radiates Yang Emperor’s Supreme Beginning, establishing the Primordial. Supreme Radiant Lord speaks Heavenly Emperor’s luminous longevity command—greatly auspicious. Emperor commands, safeguarding and conveying life’s qi. Nine Heavens’ Mountain Illuminating King, Upper Lord, Five Emperors’ Yang Mountain, Supreme Sage Emperor Qi.

chunks.original_text: 导引券符字。 九玄元气生自然炼化八道合胎仙结落紫虚秀玉轩乘运御气历天开登上九户入北关三部上真命盟文对结吾录紫素分须至九五乘唐年奉侍圣皇会河津径御八道运七元乘虚飞空辅帝尊合契解结更受仙玉童玉女各三千人报吾录卫兆身也。 白纹结带玉文。 至寂空玄虚无灵章皆九真文推数历度运应自然暂经玄母化生幽关高上九气以填上真九天精凝以填中元五帝合化以填五神三玄浩灵合成帝真欲行此道治录受文中黄紫素以部灵篇兆身三官应乘九玄能服玉字白日升晨受节自通敢负盟文违科犯律身没河源长充幽夜负火践幽三徒五苦不敢蒙原诸来启悟以今为新四司五帝列奏上言九天告下万神灵应真人降房飞霄轻盖翠羽青裙来迎兆身上升帝晨款翔九空宴景三元上告之日普愿开陈诸所告命靡不如言。 右导引录四百六十字。 苍元浩灵少阳先生九气还肝使我魂宁幽府结华藏内鲜明炼容固髓反白为青神化内发景登紫庭敢有犯诚摧以流铃上帝玉录太清真诀成仙度真飞行玉清登元受气回转云軿。 右青童七十二玉字。 乘云飞舆青桂玉女受命青童。 一符十二字。 上真上相青童六里求仙度命告文。 后符十四字。 右上相青童二十六字。 赤精补养我身高真三气归心是我丹元腾我浮躬径奏以闻心固神静九灵关金真内映紫烟结云太微绿字书名神仙。 右三九素语四十七字。 九天生符还魂度命上天泰清君。 第一十三字。 三天九五正一度命七九三气玄元丹符度命。 第二十八字。 上帝魂精九神生元三五精七元山。 第三十四字。 右素灵洞玄太有三符四十五玉字。 素元洞虚天真神庐七气守肺百神同居调炼五藏合华秀敷澄诚明石游御玄虚白玉金字九帝真书使我飞仙死名落除游洞三清适意所如。 右变化七十四方五十六字。 元百天左目行辈章大王山五六戊己清玄四八真一五气上章琼文帝章降授於文是时天光琼逮三晨回精五宿改度七元运灵九色晃爠焕落玉清飞烟蓊郁流漫八方玉陛下万宝章临庭飞仙羽盖辅翼太真仙童玉女各三千人收鬼录神众魔伏亡灵飞霄回转乘空落烟神凤匡辔灵妃导仙明星启路三道合明流电扬精逸驾九玄游眄琼阙宴景三元盘回玉霄适肆紫晨披朗书於无涯克印帝章趣形碧云理宿根於玉诀激威灵於琼文以度天人精静念於玉轩理二仪於玄图掌帝录於万仙总地司於五岳领上真於三关上统无涯下摄洞源自天之下莫不咸隶清难可滓混难澄乎 妙哉 斯至德之帝章九天之上文元始自然玉帝受之於九玄玉结以明西华玉晨。 右琼文帝章二百六十四字。 少阴告运八道开张三象旋回纬度天梁元始勒正齐契四张行兰玄岳上闻玉京上帝高尊记名无英三官落死九府顺昌自尔之后三界同迎。 右隐地八术五十六字。 产生万形儿羊上拍播公法开灾展无量通勃迫洛邓赭枭光明玉邵笃盈。 右九赤班玉字二十九。 元父混文玄母覆廉衔荒彦厥因术类伯元延生。 右羽文玉字十九字。 五岳东苍句穹芒子南洞融阳开西皓丘薄收北玄术冥收中扭灵根行。 四海东需彼鲸齐浩涛南宛格精西玄潜源北。 右黄老中记四十六玉字。 玉童侍左仙女扶右九五上帝太一主收魔束形万帝所明启御上天通真达灵徘徊云气龙驾散婴司命司录南北二君北斗七星检摄捕兵二十八宿缠绕身形泰玄阴阳三尺法清思丙转守径上九天历度阳九运收百川赤明大有焕落火铃金真王母号曰帝庭神兵十万驱除不祥执巾持录守备命门天绉前导虎贲拒行大有上道启报真文。
chunks.translated_text:
**Conveyance Talisman of Daoist Practices**

The Primordial Qi of the Nine Mysteries generates through natural refinement, merging the Eight Paths to form the Embryonic Immortal, descending into the Purple Void’s Radiant Jade Pavilion. Riding the flow, mastering qi, traversing the heavens, ascending through the Nine Gates, entering the Northern Pass—where the Three Departments’ perfected ones command—this covenant is sworn, its text recorded upon purple and plain silk. At the destined time, mounting the Nine-Five, serving the Sagely Thearch at the River Ford, swiftly guiding the Eight Paths, circulating the Seven Primes, riding the void to soar through space, aiding the Imperial Honored One, dissolving karmic knots. Three thousand Jade Lads and Jade Maidens each are assigned to safeguard and report, protecting this body’s destiny.

**White-Textured Jade Sash with Knotted Patterns**

In utmost stillness, the empty mystery, the formless numinous script—all derive from the Nine Perfected’s texts, reckoned by cycles, measured by degrees, activated by natural resonance. Momentarily passing through the Mysterious Mother’s transformations, born through the Dark Pass, the Supreme Nine Qi fill the Upper Perfected; the Nine Heavens’ essence congeals to fill the Middle Prime; the Five Emperors’ transformations merge to fill the Five Spirits; the Three Mysteries’ vast numina unite to complete the Imperial Perfected. Those who practice this Dao, govern records, and receive the texts of Central Yellow and Purple Silk shall command the numinous chapters. This body, responsive to the Three Offices, shall mount the Nine Mysteries, ingest the Jade Script, ascend at dawn to receive the mandate, and freely traverse. Dare one violate this covenant? Transgressors shall be bound by law, their bodies submerged in the River Source, eternally consigned to the Dark Night, bearing the fires of the Three Wastes and the Five Sufferings. None shall presume pardon. All who come forth to awaken—henceforth renewed—shall be reported by the Four Offices and Five Emperors, their names submitted above. The Nine Heavens shall proclaim, and the myriad spirits shall respond. Perfected ones shall descend to the chamber, soaring through the clouds beneath light canopies of kingfisher plumes and azure skirts, to welcome this body’s ascent to the Imperial Dawn, where it shall roam the Nine Void-Palaces and feast in the Three Primes’ radiance. On this day, all proclamations and decrees shall be fulfilled without fail.

**Right: Conveyance Record of 460 characters.**

**Azure Primordial’s Vast Numinous Lesser Yang Master**
The Nine Qi return to the liver, calming my hun-soul within the Dark Bureau. The Flower Treasury is inwardly bound, its brilliance refined, the visage fortified, the marrow consolidated. White reverts to azure; the spirit transforms within, emitting radiance to ascend the Purple Court. Dare one violate this sincerity? The flowing bells shall be shattered. The Jade Record of the Supreme Clarity’s Perfected Instructions perfects immortality, ferries the perfected, and soars through the Jade Clarity to ascend the Prime, receiving qi and returning amidst cloud chariots.

**Right: Azure Lad’s 72 Jade Characters.**

**Riding Clouds, Flying Chariots, Jade Maidens of the Cassia attend; the Azure Lad receives the mandate.**

**One Talisman of Twelve Characters:**
*Supreme Perfected, Supreme Minister, Azure Lad’s Sixfold Petition for Immortal Ascension and Life’s Salvation.*

**Later Talisman of Fourteen Characters:**
**Right: Supreme Minister Azure Lad’s 26 Characters.**

**Crimson Essence supplements and nurtures my body; the High Perfected’s Three Qi return to the heart. This is my Cinnabar Prime, lifting my floating form to swiftly memorialize and report. The heart is steadfast, the spirit tranquil; the Nine Numinous Passes are secured by Golden Perfection. Within, purple mist gathers; clouds form in the Supreme Subtlety. Green script inscribes the name—Divine Immortal.*

**Right: Three-Nine Plain Speech of 47 Characters.**

**Nine Heavens’ Life Talisman restores the hun-soul, ferries life, and ascends to the Supreme Clarity’s Lord.**
**First: Thirteen Characters.**

**Three Heavens’ Nine-Five Rectifies and Measures Life; the Seven-Nine Three Qi’s Mysterious Prime Cinnabar Talisman ferries life.**
**Second: Twenty-Eight Characters.**

**The Thearch’s Hun-Essence, Nine Spirits’ Prime Life, Three-Five Essence, Seven Primes’ Mountain.**
**Third: Thirty-Four Characters.**

**Right: Plain Numinous Cavern Mystery’s Supreme Three Talismans of 45 Jade Characters.**

**Plain Primordial’s Cavern Void, Heavenly Perfected’s Divine Hut—Seven Qi guard the lungs, a hundred spirits cohabit. Refining the Five Viscera, merging their splendor, unfolding purity, clarifying sincerity, the luminous stone roams the Mysterious Void. The White Jade Gold Script of the Nine Emperors’ Perfected Writ enables my flight as an immortal; death’s name is expunged. Roaming the Three Clarities, I go where I please.**

**Right: Transformations’ Seventy-Four Directions of Fifty-Six Characters.**

**Primordial Hundred Heavens’ Left Eye’s Rank Chapter, Great King Mountain’s Five-Six Wu-Ji, Pure Mystery’s Four-Eight Perfected One. The Five Qi’s Supreme Chapter, the Jade Script’s Imperial Chapter, descends to bestow upon this text. At that time, celestial light suffused the jade, reaching the Three Dawns. The Five Lodgings altered their courses; the Seven Primes circulated their numina. Nine hues blazed, resplendent, descending into the Jade Clarity. Flying mists billowed, streaming through the Eight Directions. Beneath the Jade Sovereign’s throne, myriad treasures’ chapters alighted in the court. Flying immortals with feathered canopies flanked the Supreme Perfected. Jade Lads and Jade Maidens, three thousand each, seized the ghostly records, subdued demonic hordes, and vanquished wandering spirits. Soaring through the clouds, they turned and rode the void, descending amidst mist. Divine phoenixes harnessed reins; numinous consorts guided the immortals. Bright stars illuminated the path; the Three Paths merged in brilliance. Lightning flashed, essence scattered. Driving the Nine Mysteries, I surveyed the jade palaces, feasted in the Three Primes’ radiance, and circled the Jade Empyrean. Freely traversing the Purple Dawn, I unfolded the luminous script’s boundlessness, stamping the Imperial Chapter to hasten its form. Azure clouds ordered the lodgings’ roots within the Jade Instructions; majestic numina were stirred within the Jade Script to ferry celestial and human beings. Serene contemplation focused upon the Jade Pavilion; the Two Modes were ordered within the Mysterious Diagram. The Thearch’s records were held among the myriad immortals; the Earth’s offices were governed by the Five Peaks. The Upper Perfected were led through the Three Passes, ruling the boundless above and governing the Cavern Sources below. From the heavens’ depths, none failed to submit. How could the pure be sullied? How could the turbid be clarified?

**Wondrous indeed!**
This Imperial Chapter of Supreme Virtue, the Nine Heavens’ supreme script, the Primordial’s natural Jade Thearch, receives it from the Nine Mysteries’ Jade Knot to illumine the Western Florescence’s Jade Dawn.

**Right: Jade Script’s Imperial Chapter of 264 Characters.**

**Lesser Yin proclaims the flow; the Eight Paths unfold. The Three Images revolve, weaving celestial beams. The Primordial rectifies and aligns the Fourfold Expansion. Orchid and Mystery Peak ascend to report to the Jade Capital. The Supreme Thearch records names in the Limitless Register. The Three Offices release the dead; the Nine Bureaus prosper. Henceforth, the Three Realms shall unite in welcome.**

**Right: Hidden Earth’s Eight Arts of Fifty-Six Characters.**

**Generating myriad forms, the lamb’s upper pat, the elder’s law unfolds calamities, extending boundless penetration. Urgency presses Luo Deng; ochre owls radiate luminous jade. Shao’s virtue overflows.**

**Right: Nine Crimson Speckled Jade Characters of Twenty-Nine.**

**Primordial Father’s Chaos Script, Mysterious Mother’s Veiled Integrity, embracing desolation, their causes and arts akin to Bo Yuan, extending life.**

**Right: Feather Script’s Jade Characters of Nineteen.**

**Five Peaks: East—Azure Phrase, Vault’s Radiance; South—Cavern’s Flourishing Yang; West—Luminous Mound, Fading Harvest; North—Mysterious Art, Dark Harvest; Center—Twisted Numinous Root’s Flow.**

**Four Seas: East—Need’s Whale Qi, Vast Waves; South—Wan’s Refined Essence; West—Mysterious Submerged Source; North—[omitted].**

**Right: Yellow Elder’s Central Record of Forty-Six Jade Characters.**

**Jade Lad attends the left; Immortal Maiden supports the right. The Nine-Five Thearch, Supreme One, commands the subduing of demons and binding of forms. The myriad thearchs’ illumination initiates and guides, ascending to heaven, communicating with the perfected, reaching the numinous. Lingering amidst cloud and qi, dragon-drawn chariots disperse. Infant and Life-Controller, Record-Keeper, Southern and Northern Lords, Northern Dipper’s Seven Stars inspect and seize. Twenty-Eight Lodgings entwine this body’s form. Supreme Mystery’s Yin-Yang, three-foot Dharma, pure contemplation, bing-turning guard, traversing the Nine Heavens’ degrees. Yang’s Nine Circulations gather the hundred streams. Crimson Clarity’s Great Possession blazes, descending with fire bells. Golden Perfection’s Queen Mother is titled Imperial Court’s Divine Soldiers—one hundred thousand strong—driving away inauspiciousness. Holding cloth and records, they guard the Life Gate. Heavenly Creases lead the van; tiger warriors repel the advance. Great Possession’s Upper Dao initiates and reports the Perfected Text.**
